title: Mobile-Based Mathematical Concept Contextualization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of elementary and secondary mathematics concepts (fractions, geometry, measurement, etc.)
context.additional_context: Process for elementary teachers to create and share mobile-device-optimized contextualized mathematics concept materials for classroom application

learning_goals: Learners can document 20 or more real-life mathematical concepts via photos/videos and write contextual explanations.
Learners can conduct five or more peer feedback sessions based on self-produced content to enhance concept application.
Learners can complete an educational digital content package contextualizing a specific mathematical concept as a final project.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
